Text.Page:
Did you know {@LinkCreature:21#1#vicious dusky basilisks} are covered with the thickest, lightest scales? If you could bring me some, I could outfit our soldiers with better armor. It'd save a lot of lives!

Up to it?

The stories I've heard weren't keener hogwash. You really are quite a fighter!

Thanks for the scales. I'll put them to good use!
This isn't easy, but I wouldn't ask if it weren't also necessary.
